name: PharaohDroid - Team 9 - 21/22 Y1D
description: How were the pyramids built? Why, aliens of course. The sons of Horus promised prosperity and freedom but brought humanity to ruin and enslavement with their alien technology. You’re the last soul to have your own mind. Wake from your ancient, decrepit tomb and use the power of your soul to outsmart and take control of enemy robots to escape from the depths in this action-packed top-down shooter.
